p: Subsequently, a structural study was undertaken with the NPs that exhibited the most favorable anti-mycobacterial profiles, i.e., show lower energies than the control inhibitor ( Figure 1). Thus, the interaction between the bisbenzylisoquinoline alkaloids 2-nortiliacorinine, tiliacorine and 13â€²-bromotiliacorinine against the targets PknB and DprE1 were modeled.
